text: Ami tadera bali ni tumi ya amake adesa karecha ta chara an'ya kichu, yatha -- 'tomara allah‌ra upasana karo yini amara prabhu o tomadera prabhu’, ara ami tadera saksi chilama yatadina ami tadera madhye chilama, kintu yakhana tumi amara mrtyu ghatale takhana tumi'i chile tadera upare prahari. Ara tumi'i haccho saba-kichura'i saksi.
